first_para: Anna Arrowsmith (born 1972 in Kent), who works under the pseudonym Anna Span, is an English pornographic film producer. She makes frequent public appearances, speaking on sex, pornography and feminism, though not without significant opposition from feminists.

full.extract: Anna Arrowsmith (born 1972 in Kent), who works under the pseudonym Anna Span, is an English pornographic film producer. She makes frequent public appearances, speaking on sex, pornography and feminism, though not without significant opposition from feminists.
full.title: Anna Span
